title: MOOC Design for Adult Learners: Enhancing Self-Directed Learning Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational knowledge in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Optimizes simulation/VR content delivery in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Requires customized scenario development to strengthen individual job relevance

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute three or more learning goals using self-directed learning strategies in MOOC environments.
Learners can evaluate problem-solving abilities similar to real-world job scenarios (e.g., medical/legal counseling) through simulation/VR-based tasks with at least 80% satisfaction.
Learners can articulate specific achievements contributing to personal/professional development after completing a MOOC.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
